

If you're adding a new clone/remake:

```yaml
name:
repo:
url:
development:
status:
lang: []
framework: []
license:
info:
updated:
media:
  - image:
  - youtube:
  - vimeo:
```


If you're adding a new game group:

```yaml
- name:
  meta:
    genre: []
    subgenre: []
    theme: []
  clones:
    -
  reimplementations:
    -
```
